item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (1242 points | 850 comments)
2. Money lessons without money: The financial literacy fallacy (16 points | 3 comments)
3. Augurs demo (59 points | 3 comments)

7. Surface-Stable Fractal Dither on Playdate (80 points | 7 comments)

9. Johnny.Decimal – A system to organise your life (398 points | 216 comments)
10. Yocto, RockPi and SBOMs: Building modern embedded Linux images (116 points | 68 comments)
11. Bybit loses $1.5B in hack but can cover loss, CEO confirms (159 points | 146 comments)
12. Reality has a surprising amount of detail (2017) (291 points | 148 comments)
13. Show HN: Slime OS – An open-source app launcher for RP2040 based devices (113 points | 4 comments)
14. The Ren'Py Visual Novel Engine (166 points | 69 comments)

19. Can you lose your native tongue? (2024) (66 points | 88 comments)
20. Math Academy, part 1: My eigenvector embarassment (60 points | 44 comments)
21. I found a backdoor into my bed (731 points | 311 comments)
22. Suckless.org: software that sucks less (272 points | 161 comments)
23. Ancient switch to soft food gave us overbite–the ability to pronounce 'f's,'v' (146 points | 98 comments)
24. SVDQuant+NVFP4: 4× Smaller, 3× Faster FLUX with 16-bit Quality on Blackwell GPUs (35 points | 7 comments)
25. Start a computer club in the place that you live (2023) (113 points | 42 comments)
26. 20 years working on the same software product (355 points | 118 comments)
27. Some critical issues with the SWE-bench dataset (322 points | 111 comments)
28. Fly To Podman: a script that will help you to migrate from Docker (168 points | 88 comments)
29. Who needs a sneaker bot when AI can hallucinate a win for you? (132 points | 35 comments)
